keyTakeAways: Ian Roberts, a former superintendent of Des Moines Public Schools, was indicted by a federal grand jury for falsely claiming U.S. citizenship on an I-9 form.
Roberts, originally from Guyana, was detained by ICE on September 26, 2025, and fled in a district-issued Jeep Cherokee before being found in a wooded area.
Roberts was found with a handgun wrapped in a towel in the vehicle, and three additional firearms were discovered at his home, including two pistols, a rifle, and a shotgun.
The indictment alleges that Roberts made a false attestation on an I-9 form, claiming to be a U.S. citizen when he was not.
An immigration judge issued a final removal order last year, and an appeal to reopen immigration proceedings was rejected earlier in 2025.
Roberts was charged with both making a false statement for employment and being an illegal alien in possession of a firearm.
Des Moines Public Schools has filed a lawsuit against the consulting firm it used to facilitate the superintendent search in 2023, citing concerns over improper hiring practices.

Jackie Norris, the school board chair, proposed a review of Roberts’ expenditures and ended her campaign for U.S. Senate after the AP investigation revealed the firm had marketed Roberts as a consultant.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Ian Roberts, the former superintendent of Des Moines Public Schools, was indicted by a federal grand jury for falsely claiming U.S. citizenship on an I-9 form and for unlawfully possessing firearms while illegally present in the United States. Originally from Guyana, Roberts was detained by ICE on September 26, 2025, fled in a district-issued vehicle, and was later found with a handgun and several other weapons at his home. Authorities state that he made a false attestation on an employment eligibility form, and an immigration judge issued a final removal order, which was upheld after an appeal. The incident has led to significant fallout, including a lawsuit filed by the school district against the consulting firm that facilitated the hiring process and a review of Roberts’ expenditures by school board chair Jackie Norris, who also ended her campaign for U.S. Senate.
title: Iowa Superintendent Detained by ICE Falsely Claimed He Was a US Citizen, Indictment Says
